original_text: The son who succeeds him as priest, who comes into the tent of meeting to minister in the Holy Place, shall wear them seven days.
korean_text: 그를 이어 제사장이 되는 아들이 회막에 들어가서 성소에서 섬길 때에는 이레 동안 그것을 입을지니라

sentences.original_text: The son who succeeds him as priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 뒤를 이어 제사장이 될 아들은

sentences.original_text: who comes into the tent of meeting
to minister in the Holy Place
